Posts.Title: need the PEC this thursday in nj!

Posts.Content:
thank you all! it's quite a comfort knowing i won't be alone in that operating room! i'll let you know how it goes as soon as i'm able!
thank you, thank you!!!!!
Posts.Title: need the PEC this thursday in nj!
Having Trouble Finding a Breast Surgeon - HELP!!

Posts.Content: first, let me thank all of you for your prayers and encouragement!
Posts.Title: Home, got my results and i'm thrilled!
PCE, ready to board for NJ.....

Posts.Content:
thanks for the warm welcome. mary - i have already done chemo and radiation. thought i was finished!!!!! going to see a pulminary specialist on tuesday to see about these spots on my lungs. i'm keeping my fingers crossed that they aren't cancer! i'll keep everyone posted!
thanks for the compliments on my beautiful boy zeke. he's the love of our lives. we don't have skin kids and we treat zeke like he's our child. he's the sweetest pup around and i thank god every day he's here in our lives. don't know what i would do without my puppy hugs and kisses!!!!!
hugs,
stacy
Posts.Title: Hi and welcome Donnarock!!!

Posts.Content:
lol! zeke isn't really a puppy. he's three. but he'll always be my pup! he's a mix of sheppard and golden retriever. we were told he's a dog in conflict (lol just what we need). he's gentle like a retreiver but protective like a sheppard. 
i love schnauzers! zeke's first friend was a schnauzer that use to live next to us. boy could that little guy bark!!!! lol!
hugs,
stacy
